text: An accurate, merciless driving sim that was unlucky to be overshadowed by Gran Turismo 4. Passing all the stages in the driving school -portion felt almost impossible with just a controller.

text: Man this game was so fantastic! Not because of the graphics but because of the physics and tracks! I've been racing and drifting a LONG time and Enthusia still stands out as having some of the best drifting physics I've ever encountered on a home console.

author: Solunous

text:
Cool, but something has been bugging me for a little while. I know this is kind of off topic, though.
I know this is your list, but I'm kind of surprised more tracks from Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze haven't appeared on here. If you've forgotten about it, I'd suggest going back and checking the soundtrack out again. If you just don't care for it, I'm surprised, but I accept it.
Just my two cents. Good choice for this one.
author: Nate Jacobson

text: +Nate Jacobson I think I might be in the minority that I just don't find Tropical Freeze's soundtrack all that memorable. I feel that Rayman Origins and Legends's soundtrack are just so much better. David Wise is still an amazing composer though, and he has my respect.
author: Marcos Garcia

text:
+Marcos Garcia Huh, yeah, to be honest, I am a bit surprised, but I do respect your opinion; music is subjective. I just find Tropical Freeze's soundtrack to be the best out of the whole series (which is saying a lot, but I really do think so).
But those games you mentioned, from what little I've heard of them, do have pretty good soundtracks; I'll agree with you on that. Origins' Land of Dead World I particularly enjoy.
author: Nate Jacobson

text: Awakening has to be one of my favorite music in a racing game, and the rest of Enthusia's soundtrack is full of quality themes including this one. I'll be working on the #1900 video in the upcoming days, I really want to upload it this weekend as I'm leaving on vacation for 2 weeks next Monday!
author: SupraDarky

text: +SupraDarky Super excited for it! If I had a guess, It'd probably be Shadow Hearts.
